00038 RainbruRPG::Server::LogExportDialog::LogExportDialog(QWidget* parent)
00039   :QDialog(parent)
00040 {
00041   setWindowTitle(tr("Log Exporter dialog"));
00042   setMinimumSize(600, 300);
00043 
00044   // The main layout
00045   QVBoxLayout* vb1=new QVBoxLayout();
00046   this->setLayout(vb1);
00047 
00048   // The filename label
00049   QLabel* lblFilename=new QLabel(tr("Log filename"), this);
00050   vb1->addWidget(lblFilename);
00051 
00052   // ****************************************
00053   // The filename layout
00054   QHBoxLayout* hb1=new QHBoxLayout();
00055   vb1->addLayout(hb1);
00056 
00057   // The filename line edit
00058   leFilename=new QLineEdit( this);
00059   hb1->addWidget(leFilename);
00060 
00061   // The change filename  button
00062   QPushButton* btnChange=new QPushButton(tr("Change"), this);
00063   hb1->addWidget(btnChange);
00064 
00065   // ****************************************
00066   // The preview label layout
00067   QHBoxLayout* hb2=new QHBoxLayout();
00068   vb1->addLayout(hb2);
00069 
00070   //The preview Label
00071   QLabel* labPreview=new QLabel(tr("Preview"), this);
00072   hb2->addWidget(labPreview);
00073   // A space between the Preview label and Refresh button
00074   hb2->addStretch(1);
00075   // The Refresh button
00076   QPushButton* btnRefresh=new QPushButton(tr("Refresh"), this);
00077   hb2->addWidget(btnRefresh);
00078 
00079   //The preview TextEdit
00080   QTextEdit* tePreview=new QTextEdit();
00081   vb1->addWidget(tePreview);
00082 
00083   // ****************************************
00084   // The buttons layout
00085   QHBoxLayout* hbb=new QHBoxLayout();
00086   vb1->addLayout(hbb);
00087 
00088   // The Cancel button
00089   QPushButton* btnCancel=new QPushButton(tr("Cancel"), this);
00090   hbb->addWidget(btnCancel);
00091 
00092   // A space between the OK and Cancel buttons
00093   hbb->addStretch(1);
00094 
00095   // The OK button
00096   QPushButton* btnOk=new QPushButton(tr("OK"), this);
00097   hbb->addWidget(btnOk);
00098 
00099   // Connections
00100   connect( btnOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()) );
00101   connect( btnCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()) );
00102   connect( btnChange, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(changeFilename()) );
00103 
00104   // Other initializations
00105   initFilename();
00106 }

00118 void RainbruRPG::Server::LogExportDialog::changeFilename(){
00119   QString s=QFileDialog::getSaveFileName();
00120   leFilename->setText(s);
00121   filename=s;
00122 }
00123 
00128 void RainbruRPG::Server::LogExportDialog::initFilename(){
00129   QDir dir;
00130   QString s=dir.absoluteFilePath("server.export.log");
00131   leFilename->setText(s);
00132   filename=s;
00133 }
00134 
00140 const QString& RainbruRPG::Server::LogExportDialog::getFilename(){
00141   return filename;
00142 }
